name: Furless Future
description:
MOONMOON's cat Eddie is missing after MOONMOON has come out of his cryogenic sleep. MOONMOON must search for Eddie and destroy the nanites taking over Eddie's body.

This game was made in 72 hours during the MOONMOON 2020 game jam by Toocanzs, Loquacity, Fruxx, and BaoWowOw.
